title: Audit Data Retention Policy Compliance
description: An auditor checks if data is being disposed of in accordance with the company's data retention policy.

tasks.description: Review the data retention policy to identify the required retention period for customer emails (e.g., 7 years).
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor understands the policy requirement.

tasks.description: Query the email archive system for any customer emails that are older than 7 years.
tasks.expected_outcome: The query returns a significant number of emails that should have been deleted.

tasks.description: Document the failure to follow the retention policy as a finding, noting the increased legal discovery and storage costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: A finding is created to address the non-compliance.
